query:
SELECT '[[Datei:Object_' || objects.name || '.png|zentriert|frameless|75px]]' AS Bild, objects.name AS Name, objects.name || '

' || '[[Konsole#Allgemein|Konsole]]:
' || 'object ' || objects.name || '' AS ID, '#Lang#object.' || objects.name || '.desc' AS Beschreibung, recipes_objects.category AS Kategorie, recipes_objects.subcategory AS Unterkategorie, recipes_objects.recipe AS Rezept, recipes_objects.craftingstations AS Werkbank, strength, placetime, objects.type AS Typ, assetpath, '#Version#' || objects.name AS 'Ab Version' FROM objects INNER JOIN recipes_objects ON objects.name = recipes_objects.name WHERE objects.name NOT NULL AND objects.assetpath NOT NULL AND recipes_objects.category='Furnishings' AND recipes_objects.subcategory='Storages' order by objects.name
